entry.title: PyData Dublin at 404 - The Ultimate Tech Meetup

link.title: PyData Dublin at 404 - The Ultimate Tech Meetup

entry.content:
PyData Dublin at 404 - The Ultimate Tech Meetup

Next Saturday, PyData Dublin will be heading to

  • location
  • Why is pydata dublin there?
  • Speakers and installations look cool.
  • Mostly: looks like a fun day out for tech enthusiasts to get together and network.
  • They’ve even featured in the news: link to RTE.
  • Join us! Here’s a 10% discount code: PYDATA-DUB
entry.summary: PyData Dublin at 404 - The Ultimate Tech Meetup

entry.title: Launch of PyData Dublin at Workday

link.title: Launch of PyData Dublin at Workday

entry.content:
To overlay title or not to overaly title…

  • Workday sponsored pizza and beer (and many other random nibbles).
  • Beautiful space and all the tech worked.
  • First talk was by Barry. Summarize, image(s), link to video, link to slides, link to paper.
  • Second talk was Derek. Summarize, images, link to video, link to slides, link to repo.
  • Headed to Dice bar afterwards.
  • Interested in presenting a talk? We’re currently looking for lightning talk speakers. Send us your proposals for a 5min max overview of a project/package/library that you’ve found useful or interesting.
entry.summary: A summary of our first event held in Workday, Dublin.
